---
title: "histogram"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("histogram.R")
library(knitr)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
perp_hist <- ggplot(perp_age, aes(x = Perpetrator.Age)) +
  xlim(0, 100) +
  labs(title="Frequencies of Perpatrator Ages", x="Age") +
  geom_histogram(color="red", fill="red", alpha=0.5, binwidth = 5) +
  theme_minimal()

vict_hist <- ggplot(vict_age, aes(x = Victim.Age)) +
  xlim(0, 100) +
  labs(title="Frequencies of Victim Ages", x = "Age", fill = "white") +
  geom_histogram(color="blue", fill="blue", alpha=0.5, binwidth = 5, position = "identity") +
  theme_minimal()

perp_hist
vict_hist
```
